Lumia 900: The ultimate Windows Phone?

The Lumia 900 from Nokia is easily the best phone running Microsoft's Windows Phone 7 software. It's a sleek and worthy rival to the more costly iPhone, and may be a last chance for both companies in the market. (Globe)

fuzzy Romney this fall
